page.title: 14Launceston College
page.content: Launceston is the secondary school for the area. It takes children from different primary schools many of whom are "bused" into the College each day.In the College there are about 1100 pupils whose ages range from 11 to 18. There are 63 full time teachers and a few part time staff. The buildings themselves have been added to over the years but the oldest part of the building was built in the 1890's There is also a boarding house which houses 25 boy boarders. The school is divided into 4 houses which are named after famous Cornishmen-Davy, Lanyon,Burnard and Trevithick.There are 3 faculties for academic work . The pupils are divided into tutor sets depending on which house they are in. The College uniform is blue,black or grey.
